citations.narrative:
A method of identification for all puppies less than 16 weeks of age is not currently being used. Nine puppies (5 Havanese
puppies born on 14-November-2025 and 4 Poodle puppies born 20-November-2025) did not have any form of
identification at the time of inspection. Failure to ensure that puppies are identified properly impedes APHIS officials'
ability to ensure disease identification, treatment, and trace back, or in cases of theft or loss. Class "A" dealers shall
identify all live dogs on the premises. Correct by ensuring proper identification is used, documented, and maintained for
all dogs at the facility. Correct by, 19-January-2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(2) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
A method of identification for all puppies less than 16 weeks of age is not currently being used. Nine puppies (5 Havanese 
puppies born on 14-November-2025 and 4 Poodle puppies born 20-November-2025) did not have any form of 
identification at the time of inspection. Failure to ensure that puppies are identified properly impedes APHIS officials' 
ability to ensure disease identification, treatment, and trace back, or in cases of theft or loss. Class "A" dealers shall 
identify all live dogs on the premises. Correct by ensuring proper identification is used, documented, and maintained for 
all dogs at the facility. Correct by, 19-January-2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
